body.p: A Kentucky farmer and public servant. Married to Ann Catherine Stuart. Father of John Alexander Stuart, Barbara Elizabeth Stuart Connelly, Elmira C. Stuart, and Emma Stuart Wooldridge. Served as assessor of revenue for Hardin County, Kentucky in 1864.
